forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 56F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 11C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 51F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 40F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. WNW winds shifting to NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 38F. WNW winds shifting to NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 51F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 38F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 14C. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 56F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
